message: Let's start fair.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  I think this is a reasonable starting point.
I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split. You can't start with a 55/45 split and expect me to accept it easily!
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. Inflation is hitting us both, and I think a fair and equal share is the best way forward. What do you say?
